title: Can Riot tell the difference between an internet DC and a leaver?
body: Because I know that I'm going to get reported for having my net cut out when the enemy Nexus was so low only to reconnect and find that we lost shortly after I poofed.

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system treats everyone equally, regardless of a leave being intentional or not.  As long as you don't have a history of leaves you'll be okay, because the system won't penalize you for a single match.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I don't really think they'd be able to personally. If they could, all the player would have to do is disconnect from the internet for a little bit and boom, that on-purpose leaver is spared. I'd rather not have more of a reason for leavers to not be punished, seems like that sort of thing would be more harm than good if you think about the fact it could end up used to avoid leaver penalties if they added it...
